title: Buffy.The.Vampire.Slayer.S01.Complete.Pivot.1080i.with.English.a
description:
New upload of Buffy Season One, this torrent has all 12 original episodes as broadcast by the Pivot channel, however I remuxed them to .mkv, and included English and Spanish subtitles, ripped from the DVDs. 

I will be watching for more episodes, and uploading them as they come along.
